https://tmrev.io/movie/853020-Am Rande der Arena 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The movie is about the encounter of a man and a woman who meet for the first time in a foreign city. Together they embark on a journey which leads them to the edges, the peripheries of society, to places bloked from our vision, to marginal zones, wasteland, ghettos, urban slums, or the remnants of a dying rural culture. Am Rande der Arena
